api_list.name: Monthly Point Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides historical monthly statistics for a geographic location. The data provided through this endpoint is aggregated from multiple governmental interfaces.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: The end date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The start date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

optional_parameters.name: freq
optional_parameters.description: The time frequency of the records. Can be used for custom aggregation. Default is *null*.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: The unit system of the meteorological parameters. Default is metric.

optional_parameters.name: alt
optional_parameters.description: The point's elevation.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter which specifies whether missing data should be substituted with statistically optimized model data. Default is *true*.

api_list.name: Monthly Station Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides historical monthly statistics for a particular weather station. The data provided through this endpoint is aggregated from multiple governmental interfaces.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: The end date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The start date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: The unit system of the meteorological parameters. Default is metric.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter which specifies whether missing data should be substituted with statistically optimized model data. Default is *true*.

optional_parameters.name: freq
optional_parameters.description: The time frequency of the records. Can be used for custom aggregation. Default is *null*.

api_list.name: Station Meta Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides meta data for a particular weather station.

optional_parameters.name: wmo
optional_parameters.description: The WMO identifier of a weather station.

optional_parameters.name: icao
optional_parameters.description: The ICAO identifier of a weather station.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The Meteostat identifier of a weather station.

api_list.name: Daily Point Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides historical daily statistics for a geographic location. The data provided through this endpoint is aggregated from multiple governmental interfaces.

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The start date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: The end date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: The unit system of the meteorological parameters. Default is metric.

optional_parameters.name: freq
optional_parameters.description: The time frequency of the records. Can be used for custom aggregation. Default is *null*.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter which specifies whether missing data should be substituted with statistically optimized model data. Default is *true*.

optional_parameters.name: alt
optional_parameters.description: The point's elevation.

api_list.name: Hourly Point Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides historical hourly observations for a geographic location. The data provided through this endpoint is aggregated from multiple governmental interfaces.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: The end date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The start date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

optional_parameters.name: tz
optional_parameters.description: The time zone according to the tz database. Default is UTC.

optional_parameters.name: alt
optional_parameters.description: The point's elevation.

optional_parameters.name: freq
optional_parameters.description: The time frequency of the records. Can be used for custom aggregation. Default is *null*.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter which specifies whether missing data should be substituted with statistically optimized model data. Default is *true*.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: The unit system of the meteorological parameters. Default is metric.

api_list.name: Station Climate Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides climate normals for a particular weather station.

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: The end year of the reference period.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: The start year of the reference period.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: The unit system of the meteorological parameters. Default is metric.

api_list.name: Point Climate Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides climate normals for any geo location.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: The unit system of the meteorological parameters. Default is metric.

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: The end year of the reference period.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: The start year of the reference period.

optional_parameters.name: alt
optional_parameters.description: The point's elevation.

api_list.name: Nearby Stations
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a list of nearby weather stations for a given geographical location.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of weather stations. Default is 10.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The meter radius to search in. Default is 100000.

api_list.name: Hourly Station Data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides historical hourly observations for a particular weather station. The data provided through this endpoint is aggregated from multiple governmental interfaces.

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The start date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: The end date of the period (YYYY-MM-DD).

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: A boolean parameter which specifies whether missing observations should be substituted with statistically optimized model data. Default is *true*.

optional_parameters.name: tz
optional_parameters.description: The time zone according to the tz database. Default is UTC.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: The unit system of the meteorological parameters. Default is metric.

optional_parameters.name: freq
optional_parameters.description: The time frequency of the records. Can be used for custom aggregation. Default is *null*.
